name: Asparagus
properties: Can be roasted or used in soups
benefits: Low calorie, nutrient-dense vegetable that supports weight loss. Excellent source of fiber and vitamins. Helps create satisfying, low-calorie meals.

quotes: SPRING GREENS SOUP WITH ROASTED ASPARAGUS - This bright and comforting soup is packed with fresh greens, peas and roasted asparagus. Enjoy it hot, warm or chilled.
